mapper.select: SELECT a.`id` as "userId", a.`name` as "userName", b.`areaid` as "areaId", ar.area_name areaName, a.g_id FROM yc_account_tab a left join t_grid b on a.`g_id` = b.`g_id` left join yc_area_tab ar on ar.id = b.areaid left join yc_account_role_tab r on a.`id` = r.`user_id` WHERE r.`role_id` = #{roleId} AND r.`state` = 1 AND a.`is_delete` = 1
